name: Wings of Virtus
description: Wings of Virtus is an indie shoot-em-up that is all about minimalistic but challenging retro arcade gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB video card Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB nVidia or AMD card with support for OpenGL 2.0+ Storage: 150 MB available space
